data.title: Marco Khan
data.meta_description: Marco Khanlian, known professionally as Marco Khan, is an American actor and stunt performer of Iranian Armenian origin.
data.text:
Marco Khanlian (Armenian: Մարկո Խանլեան, Persian: مارکو خانلیان; born March 27, 1961), known professionally as Marco Khan (Armenian: Մարկո Խան), is an American actor and stunt performer of Iranian Armenian origin.[1]
